subject: Missing Baseplate from Order #SSN2867
description_text:
Hello,

I recently placed an order for two pedals with the baseplate (Order
#SSN2867), but I only received the pedals â€” the baseplate was missing from
the package.

Could you please check this for me and arrange for the baseplate to be sent?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Safal

conversations.body_text: Hi Safal Bista,    We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. Our warehouse staff inadvertently omitted the base plate from your order. We have now dispatched it. Please find your logistics tracking link below.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045985462964
